Who We Are

Professional Industrial Partner

Established in 2016, PT Toolmate Technologies Indonesia has grown into a premier General Contractor and M&E Engineering firm in Batam. We are committed to customer satisfaction through legitimate business practices and continuous quality improvement.

Our mission is to serve customers with trustworthy business ethics and deliver value across every project, from clean room setups to complex water treatment facilities.

Core Capabilities

Comprehensive Industrial Solutions

M&E • HVAC • Civil Works • Fabrication

MVAC & Ducting

Complete Mechanical Ventilation & Air Conditioning systems. Specializing in exhaust duct systems, cooling tower setup/servicing, and clean room systems (SUS/Iron).

Water Treatment (WWTP)

Design and expansion of WWTP, STP, and WTP. We utilize advanced systems like MBR (Membrane Bioreactor) and MBBR. Includes pipe installation and chemical supply.

General Contractor

Civil works, renovation, equipment fabrication, epoxy flooring painting (e.g., Caterpillar facility), and air compressor/dryer setup.

HVAC & MVAC Systems

We provide full-spectrum Mechanical Ventilation and Air Conditioning solutions tailored for industrial factories and clean rooms.

  • Ducting & Fittings (Fabrication & Install)
  • Chiller & Cooling Tower Setup/Servicing
  • Exhaust Duct Systems
  • Clean Room Systems (SUS/Iron)

Environmental Engineering (WWTP)

Specialists in Waste Water Treatment Plant design, expansion, and maintenance using advanced biological technologies.

  • MBR (Membrane Bioreactor) Systems
  • MBBR (Moving Bed Biofilm Reactor)
  • Lamella Clarifiers
  • STP & WTP Piping Installation

General Contractor & Fabrication

From civil works to specialized equipment fabrication, we ensure your facility infrastructure is built to last.

  • Epoxy Flooring (Industrial Grade)
  • Steel Structure & Canopy Works
  • Air Compressor & Dryer Setup
  • Factory Renovation & M&E Installation
View All Services & Downloads
Naturelabs Biotech

Biology Genesis

Natural Bio Technology Solution for Industrial Waste Water Treatment.

Biology Genesis is a group of human-friendly and beneficial bacteria & yeast. It is a natural culture without harsh chemical mixtures. It is certified safe, non-toxic, and free of pathogenic bacteria.

Major Benefits:

  • Reduces BOD, COD, TSS and Sludge volume
  • Instantly eliminates bad odor (Ammonia/H2S)
  • Restores ecological balance in wastewater ponds
  • Reduces energy cost (efficiency in sewage treatment)

Wide Range of Application:

Hotels, Restaurants (Grease Trap), Rubber Mills, Palm Oil Mills (POME), Hospitals, Farms, and Municipal Sewage.

Major Effects

• Palm Oil Mill Effluent
• Rubber Mill Waste
• Sewage Treatment
• Grease Traps

Application Guide & Dosage

Application System Standard Dosage (Maintenance) Initial/Shock Dosing
Sewage Treatment (STP) Debit/Flow 0.5 ppm / day 5 ppm (Days 1-5)
Industrial Waste (WWTP) 100 m³/day 1 ppm / day 10 ppm (Day 1)
Grease Trap 5 m³/day 5 ppm / day 50 ppm (Day 1)

* Exact dosage may vary based on pH (5-9) and dissolved oxygen levels. Consult our engineers.

Proven Results

Before

After

McDonald's Grease Trap (Restaurant)

Application on 4 grease trap tanks with 8m³ total capacity. No skimming during trial. Reduced oil/grease and destroyed clumped sludge within 5 days treatment (50 gram/day dosage).

Before

After

Teh Botol Sosro (Tea Factory WWTP)

Significant COD, BOD, TSS and sludge volume reduction. Water color changed from black to brownish within 16 days of treatment.

Before

After

Mayora (Food Factory WWTP)

50% sludge reduction before and after treatment. Odor almost eliminated. Water changed from black to brownish. Chemical usage (coagulant & flocculant) reduced by up to 30%.
